httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostCustomersCustomerCards

When you create a new credit card, you must specify a customer or recipient on which to create it.

If the card’s owner has no default card, then the new card will become the default. However, if the owner already has a default, then it will not change. To change the default, you should update the customer to have a new default_source.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\customers\{customer}\cards HTTP/1.1
host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

customer [ in: path type: string ]
required

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "alipay_account": {
      "maxLength": 5000,
      "type": "string",
      "description": "A token returned by Stripe.js representing the user’s Alipay account details."

      "anyOf": [
        {
          "title": "customer_payment_source_bank_account",

            "account_number",

  • 200 Successful response.
  • default Error response.
